notes: %K = 100 * (close - lowest_low) / (highest_high - lowest_low). When h==l, TA-Lib returns 0

test_cases.name: close_at_high
test_cases.notes: When close = highest high in window, %K = 100

test_cases.name: close_at_low
test_cases.notes: When close = lowest low in window, %K = 0

test_cases.name: flat_price_midpoint
test_cases.notes: When h==l, denominator is 0. TA-Lib returns 0, fast-ta returns 50 (PRD spec)
